extendedInfo.description: New! My latest game - Kids Colors (Fireworks) - teaches your little one colors using the magic of fireworks.Colorful and mesmerizing! Your toddler or kid will love this game! Completely free, no ads! Read below for details on permissions.Tap the screen to unleash new colorful ripples. An interactive experience for your toddler. Now with music and  multi-touch!User reviews:âââââ My grandson loves it! And the colors couldn't be more bright and beautiful to look at! Especially for the baby, really captures his attention! ââââââââââ My 14 month old loves this, it calms him right down when he's cranky. At least something does! ââââââââââ Not only does my almost 2 yr old niece LOVE THIS, BUT so does my husband! Both of them have limited attention span, but they can play for a LONG TIME! âââââPaid version available with a lot more backgrounds (see screenshots).Check out my other toddler and preschool kids games: - Kids Animal Piano - Kids Halloween Piano - Kids Colors (Fireworks) - new! - Toddler Coloring Book - Toddler Fireworks - Escape The Bee - Toddler SmudgeIf you need a toddler lock for any of these games, download Toddler Central, a universal toddler lock!This game is still ad-free! Read on!Added option to unlock full version by completing an advertising offer. This section is protected by a toddler guard so your little one can't get there.Permissions are required for the offers and will not be used otherwise.Note: this game has been primarily designed for toddlers, but it's equally great for your baby or infant and even for older kids. Using great music by Alexander Blu: http://www.alexanderblu.comkeywords: children, kid, toddler, baby, infant, child, game, play, toddler, color, touch, music, lullaby,

reviews.title: Lock Pls!
reviews.comment: If it had a \'child lock\' so it would stay on the app, it would be perfect.  Nice music & pretty colors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice!!!
reviews.comment: I like this app alot its very awesome! I always let my little sisters play on it and they love it!!! But may I suggest a toddler lock? Thanks and keep up the grand work of yours!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC evo
reviews.comment: Works pretty good. Just wish it had more of an option like some cute stamps or different thickness of paintbrush. Did not get my daughter\'s intrest for long.
reviews.author: wendy ortega

reviews.title: Loves it!
reviews.comment: This is a great program for my 15 month old! He can play with this App and not do any damage to my phone! LOL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app, my little girl plays it for hours along with several others. She loves the colors and its easy for her to use. The only bad thing is that she can still get out if she presses the search button which takes her to the say a command window on my phone.
reviews.author: Bonnie Kemp

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I downloaded this for my special needs daughter to play when I need her to sit for long periods of time and it works like a CHARM! I love that she can\'t exit out of it and get into any other part of my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app keeps kids entertained!
reviews.comment: It keep my 1 yr old and 7 yr old busy....if I let them but I just let them play for a little while they get so upset when I have to use my phone lol love it tho!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app, pity about the malware
reviews.comment: Great app, but forcing consumers to purchase the pro version just to make it screen-lock is a little rude. Even \'Toddler Lock\' is free with a lock-screen function. Looks & works fantastic apart from that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It Great
reviews.comment: My son likes it and i love the music. I just wish i didnt have to pay for more options. I guess they do have to get paid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: My one year old loved it.  And its a plus that It has calming music.  Just perfect.
reviews.author: Martha Jimenez

reviews.title: Hypnotic
reviews.comment: My 21mth old loves it. The effects are nice, and the music is lovely. Only thing that could be added is a toddler lock.
reviews.author: Matthew Deane

reviews.title: Color Ripple
reviews.comment: Very cool considering it\'s only the free version. My grandson loves it! And the colors couldn\'t be more bright and beautiful to look at! Especially for the baby, really captures his attention!
reviews.author: Kendra R.

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Definitely a most have! Calms down kids in an.instance the bright colors and catchy tune even got me for a second! Wish the full version was free!
reviews.author: Kabria Leach

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: My 4 month old likes touching the screen and loves the music, she falls asleep to it every time!
reviews.author: TIA WIRIAATMADJA

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: My son loves this app. It keeps him occupied when there is nothing else for him to do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s up with the auto icon/app
reviews.comment: Whatever ut downloaded on to my phone... felt like my phone was getting violated ... and my daughter gets to homepage within seconds needs a better quit function ... one star because it doesn\'t gave 0
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Well I\'m 15 years old.. and I find this game fun for about a minute.. don\'t know why babies find it so fun .. but a very good app if I had fun for hours on end
reviews.author: Elias Saldana

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: My almost 2 year old said, \"whoa!\" when the app first opened. She quickly lost interest, but it still entertains her for a couple minutes at a time.
reviews.author: Julie Linton

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is simple and fun for my toddler boys. And \357\273\277the pattern unlock feature is great so I don\'t have to worry about them exiting!
reviews.author: Jennifer L

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Should have option to turn off music bad more color n pattern choice for free version but with my kids 2&6 love this app works great on galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User
